story.iWant: the site to work perfectly on my phone
story.soThat: I can participate regardless of device
story.tasks: Implement responsive layouts for mobile (<768px single-column), tablet (768-1024px two-column), desktop (>1024px three-column). Ensure 44x44px touch targets (FR87), native mobile date picker, lazy load images, critical CSS inline, <3s load on 3G (FR40). Test on iOS Safari, Android Chrome, pass Google Mobile-Friendly Test (FR93).

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: Responsive layouts: Mobile single-column with stacked elements, tablet two-column, desktop three-column. Touch optimization: 44x44px minimum tap targets (FR87), no hover-dependent interactions, 16px minimum font. Responsive images with SVG icons. Mobile performance: lazy loading, minimal JS, critical CSS inline, <3s on 3G (FR40). Testing: iOS Safari, Android Chrome, 320px-1920px, pass Google Mobile-Friendly Test (FR93).

constraints.constraint: Mobile-first approach (design for mobile, enhance for desktop)
Touch targets minimum 44x44px (FR87 - WCAG 2.1 Level AAA)
No hover-dependent interactions on mobile (use :focus for accessibility)
Native mobile date picker (input type="date" - no custom JS picker)
Minimum 16px base font size (prevents mobile zoom on input focus)
Comfortable spacing between tappable elements (min 8px gap)
Test on real iOS Safari and Android Chrome devices (FR93)
Responsive images with srcset or CSS scaling
Use Tailwind breakpoints: sm (640px), md (768px), lg (1024px)

interface.signature: sm:*, md:*, lg:* prefix classes for responsive design

tests.standards: Visual regression tests with screenshot comparison at key breakpoints. Manual testing on real iOS and Android devices. Google Mobile-Friendly Test validation. Automated tests for touch target sizes using DOM queries.
tests.locations: tests/visual/responsive.test.ts (NEW), manual testing on real devices, Google Mobile-Friendly Test
tests.ideas: Test layout at 320px, 375px, 640px, 768px, 1024px, 1920px. Test touch targets are >=44x44px. Test native mobile date picker activated. Test no horizontal scroll on mobile. Test stacked vs side-by-side layouts at breakpoints. Test lazy loading images. Test <3s load on throttled 3G.
